events.title: Arts and Crafts
events.description: Arts and Crafts for the little ones. Interactive activity fun for children of all ages. Families and children can further explore literacy and learning through reading, talking, singing, writing and playing together.

events.title: Read - A - long
events.description: Read a longs and interactive activity fun for children of all ages. Families and children can further explore literacy and learning through reading, talking, singing, writing and playing together.

events.title: Comic Books and Fun
events.description: Join us local and international comic book professionals share their knowledge for creators, readers and educators. On Sunday, a showcase of over 80 comic book creators selling their work, plus family-friendly workshops.

events.title: How to Make a Reindeer House
events.description: Make a reindeer house with us! Interactive activity fun for children of all ages. Families and children can further explore literacy and learning through reading, talking, singing, writing and playing together.

events.title: Story Time & Play Time
events.description: Big stories for the little ones. Interactive story fun for pre-schoolers and their carers. Families and children can further explore literacy and learning through reading, talking, singing, writing and playing together.

events.description: Read a longs and interactive activity fun for children of all ages. Families and children can further explore literacy and learning through reading, talking, singing, writing and playing together.
